steps.title: Continuum
steps.subtitle: Fluid mobilities might gradually change into more stable forms of migration and the other way around.
steps.content: Commercial commitments in trade agreements foster longer term migration, rather than temporary forms of mobility [IP24] The length of residency and the contributions that are required to benefit from the welfare state influence natives’ propensity to discriminate against migrants and movers [IP26–IP27] Recent changes in welfare policies have allowed individuals to move freely across countries of the Schengen area [IP22]
